Reviews.Title: the camera it's nice
Reviews.Author: Eriberto
Reviews.Content: this camera has great price and it takes great pics love it.  Delivery came prior to it's designated date witch I'm fine with that.  The extra accessories are not a great deal buy the camera without the extras and save some money. Great buy

Reviews.Title: THIS IS NICE FOR THE PRICE
Reviews.Author: Deivon Baron
Reviews.Content: THIS CAMERA IS GOOD FOR THE PERSON WHO IS NOT A PRO BUT WANT TO LOOK AND FEEL LIKE ONE. IT TAKE GREAT PICTURES AND THE ZOOM IS TOTALLY AWESOME. i ESPECIALLY LIKE THE BEAUTY FEATURE THAT IT HAS AND. FOR ALL THE EXTRAS LIKE THE TRIPOD,8GB MEMORY CARD,CLEANING KIT AND THE CARRY CASE 199.00 IS A GREAT PRICE

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: C. Primus
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures and the price is unbelievable. I am so glad I purchased this over some of the cheaper models.

Reviews.Title: Gift!
Reviews.Author: FUN
Reviews.Content: My son and I bought this for my daughter-in-law for her b-day! She loved it! It took her a while to learn about it though! It takes patience!

Reviews.Title: Best Value !!
Reviews.Author: John Blayse
Reviews.Content: My wife bought this package for our teen son. He is very interested. This package include all the basic stuff. It is a good idea for a gift for who want to learn photograph. The quality of camera is normally good with 14MP CMOS. Interestingly, Optical zoom up to 26x made every curious boy in excited.For extra ZOOM and cheap stuff ~ this camera can zoom up to 36x:http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00AOQCS82/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&camp;=1789&creative;=390957&creativeASIN;=B00AOQCS82&linkCode;=as2&tag;=dmtungrau-20

ProductInfo.Name: Olympus SP-720UZ 14MP 26x Opt Zoom 3-Inch LCD Digital Camera Silver Plus 8 GB Memory Kit
